From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

"Yeah, my training officers always used to tell me about Megatron, and
he scared me stiff. I always thought he was just an imaginare figure
though, you know to make kids behave. I recently found out I was wrong."
he replied downcast. "Optimus, I heard he died in one last fight with
Galvatron, but stopped him in the process, he died like I thought he
would, a hero." but as Firedrill finishes he roars to a stop, in behind
of a stalled Cliffjumper. 

Beachcomber stops beside, "What's up Jumper?" he asks. Cliffjumper
transforms, and turn around and pointed at a roaring ball of fire in the
sky as it sat down. 

"That's up." he informed them. He looked around. "Maybe we should check
it out." he suggested.
